main_definition: In various contexts, 'singles' refers to individuals who are not currently in a committed relationship or those who have only had one romantic partner.

meanings_and_examples.example: She attended the singles mixer, looking for someone to connect with.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who has had only one romantic partner in their lifetime
meanings_and_examples.example: After his divorce, he was considered a single by those who knew him well.

meanings_and_examples.definition: People attending social events specifically for meeting potential romantic partners
meanings_and_examples.example: The singles section of the community center hosts monthly dance parties.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A category used in sports, particularly baseball and softball, to differentiate between batters based on whether they have a partner or not.
meanings_and_examples.example: In a baseball game, players who are 'singles' refer to those at-bat without any teammates backing them up.
